1.Name: Shock Sniper
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Active Skill</color>
Unleashes an EM cannon attack on the enemy, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> and accumulating <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color>.

1.Name: Electromancer
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>
When there are at least 2 <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Attribute</color> characters in your squad: <color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color> inflicts 100% more Anomaly Buildup.

<color=#FFFFFF>Additional Ability</color>

1.Name: High-Voltage Resistance
1.Desc:
<color=#FFFFFF>Bangboo Chain Attack</color>
Unleash a strong electric attack on all nearby enemies in a large area, dealing <color=#2EB6FF>Electric DMG</color> and inflicting massive <color=#2EB6FF>Electric Anomaly Buildup</color>.
